Several papers examined the relationship of prolonged extreme heat episodes, heat waves and mortality. As there is no universal definition of heat wave,
32 some papers used the Chinese Meteorological Administration’s (CMA) official national heat wave definition of ‘at least 3 consecutive days with maximum temperature exceeding 35°C’,
